info.title: GLPI High-Level REST API
info.description:
The High-Level REST API documentation shown here is dynamically generated from the core GLPI code and any enabled plugins.
If a plugin is not enabled, its routes will not be shown here.

match.description: Logical operator to use when matching rule criteria

condition.description: The condition that triggers evaluation of this rule. Typically, 1 is for "On Add" and 2 is for "On Update".

ranking.description: The order in which to evaluate this rule. Lower numbers are evaluated first. Changing the ranking of a rule may shift the rankings of other rules.

criteria.description: The criteria to use. See /Rule/Collection/{collection}/CriteriaCriteria for a complete list of criteria.

condition.description: The condition to use. See /Rule/Collection/{collection}/CriteriaCondition for a complete list of conditions.

pattern.description: The value/pattern to match against. If the condition relates to regular expressions, this value needs to be a valid regular expression including the delimiters.

action_type.description: The action to perform. See /Rule/Collection/{collection}/ActionType for a complete list of actions.

field.description: The field to modify. See /Rule/Collection/{collection}/ActionField for a complete list of fields.

value.description: The value to set. If the field relates to regular expressions, this can include a # followed by 0 through 9 to indicate a captured value from the criteria regular expression.

parameters.description: The ID of the entity to use. If not specified, the default entity for the user is used.

parameters.name: GLPI-Profile
parameters.description: The ID of the profile to use. If not specified, the default profile for the user is used.

parameters.name: GLPI-Entity-Recursive
parameters.description: "true" if the entity access should include child entities. This is false by default.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: The language to use for the response. If not specified, the default language for the user is used.

parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
One or more properties to sort by in the form of property:direction where property is the full property name in dot notation and direction is either asc or desc.

parameters.description: The ID of the entity to use. If not specified, the default entity for the user is used.

parameters.name: GLPI-Profile
parameters.description: The ID of the profile to use. If not specified, the default profile for the user is used.

parameters.name: GLPI-Entity-Recursive
parameters.description: "true" if the entity access should include child entities. This is false by default.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: The language to use for the response. If not specified, the default language for the user is used.

get.description: List or search custom assets of a specific type

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: RSQL query string

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The first item to return

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
One or more properties to sort by in the form of property:direction where property is the full property name in dot notation and direction is either asc or desc.
                                  If no direction is provided, asc is assumed. Multiple sorts can be provided by separating them with a comma.

parameters.name: GLPI-Entity
parameters.description: The ID of the entity to use. If not specified, the default entity for the user is used.

parameters.name: GLPI-Profile
parameters.description: The ID of the profile to use. If not specified, the default profile for the user is used.

parameters.name: GLPI-Entity-Recursive
parameters.description: "true" if the entity access should include child entities. This is false by default.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: The language to use for the response. If not specified, the default language for the user is used.

Location.description: The URL of the newly created resource

get.description: List or search for the components of a specific component definition

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: RSQL query string

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The first item to return

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
One or more properties to sort by in the form of property:direction where property is the full property name in dot notation and direction is either asc or desc.
                                  If no direction is provided, asc is assumed. Multiple sorts can be provided by separating them with a comma.

parameters.description: The ID of the entity to use. If not specified, the default entity for the user is used.

parameters.name: GLPI-Profile
parameters.description: The ID of the profile to use. If not specified, the default profile for the user is used.

parameters.name: GLPI-Entity-Recursive
parameters.description: "true" if the entity access should include child entities. This is false by default.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: The language to use for the response. If not specified, the default language for the user is used.

get.description: List or search all components for an asset

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: RSQL query string

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The first item to return

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
One or more properties to sort by in the form of property:direction where property is the full property name in dot notation and direction is either asc or desc.
                                  If no direction is provided, asc is assumed. Multiple sorts can be provided by separating them with a comma.

One or more properties to sort by in the form of property:direction where property is the full property name in dot notation and direction is either asc or desc.
                                  If no direction is provided, asc is assumed. Multiple sorts can be provided by separating them with a comma.

parameters.description: "true" if the entity access should include child entities. This is false by default.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: The language to use for the response. If not specified, the default language for the user is used.

parameters.name: GLPI-Profile
parameters.description: The ID of the profile to use. If not specified, the default profile for the user is used.

parameters.name: GLPI-Entity-Recursive
parameters.description: "true" if the entity access should include child entities. This is false by default.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: The language to use for the response. If not specified, the default language for the user is used.

get.description: List or search all components for an asset

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: RSQL query string

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The first item to return

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
One or more properties to sort by in the form of property:direction where property is the full property name in dot notation and direction is either asc or desc.
                                  If no direction is provided, asc is assumed. Multiple sorts can be provided by separating them with a comma.

One or more properties to sort by in the form of property:direction where property is the full property name in dot notation and direction is either asc or desc.

get.description: List or search for Configs

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: RSQL query string

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The first item to return

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
One or more properties to sort by in the form of property:direction where property is the full property name in dot notation and direction is either asc or desc.
                                  If no direction is provided, asc is assumed. Multiple sorts can be provided by separating them with a comma.

parameters.name: GLPI-Entity
parameters.description: The ID of the entity to use. If not specified, the default entity for the user is used.

parameters.name: GLPI-Profile
parameters.description: The ID of the profile to use. If not specified, the default profile for the user is used.

parameters.name: GLPI-Entity-Recursive
parameters.description: "true" if the entity access should include child entities. This is false by default.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: The language to use for the response. If not specified, the default language for the user is used.
